name: Office 17
description:
Congratulations! You have just been promoted to Office 17.

Your tasks as an officer of the hundred are simple: maintain total congruence, make decisions about the management of incongruent phenomena, and keep incongruity from the public eye. Also, don't get fired.

Good luck, Officer 17.

Features:

  • 15,000~ words
  • 7 endings, most with small variations based on previous choices
  • A variety of available cases to manage, which change based on your choices
  • Ungendered main character

Office 17 is a visual novel made in Ren'Py for NaNoRENo 2023. Please see the game's "about" section for thorough credits!

CONTENT WARNINGS: Mentions of death and killing. One description of self-injury.
